segment.source: Learn about the tools available to deploy Windows 10.
segment.target: Learn about the tools available to deploy Windows 10.

segment.source: Learn about the tools available to deploy Windows 10.
segment.target: Learn about the tools available to deploy Windows 10.

segment.source: To successfully deploy the Windows 10 operating system and applications for your organization, it is essential that you know about the available tools to help with the process.
segment.target: To successfully deploy the Windows 10 operating system and applications for your organization, it is essential that you know about the available tools to help with the process.

segment.source: In this topic, you will learn about the most commonly used tools for Windows 10 deployment.
segment.target: In this topic, you will learn about the most commonly used tools for Windows 10 deployment.

segment.source: Windows ADK for Windows 10 scenarios for IT Pros
segment.target: Windows ADK for Windows 10 scenarios for IT Pros

segment.source: The Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (Windows ADK) contains tools that can be used by IT Pros to deploy Windows.
segment.target: The Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (Windows ADK) contains tools that can be used by IT Pros to deploy Windows.

segment.source: Volume Activation Management Tool (VAMT) Technical Reference
segment.target: Volume Activation Management Tool (VAMT) Technical Reference

segment.source: The Volume Activation Management Tool (VAMT) enables network administrators and other IT professionals to automate and centrally manage the Windows®, Microsoft® Office, and select other Microsoft products volume and retail-activation process.
segment.target: The Volume Activation Management Tool (VAMT) enables network administrators and other IT professionals to automate and centrally manage the Windows®, Microsoft® Office, and select other Microsoft products volume and retail-activation process.

segment.source: User State Migration Tool (USMT) Technical Reference
segment.target: User State Migration Tool (USMT) Technical Reference

segment.source: The User State Migration Tool (USMT) 10.0 is included with the Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (Windows ADK) for Windows 10.
segment.target: The User State Migration Tool (USMT) 10.0 is included with the Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (Windows ADK) for Windows 10.

segment.source: USMT provides a highly customizable user-profile migration experience for IT professionals.
segment.target: USMT provides a highly customizable user-profile migration experience for IT professionals.
